## Project Details
- **Type**: Spring Boot Java Backend
- **Java Version**: 17
- **Spring Boot Version**: 3.2
- **Database**: MySQL
- **Build Tool**: Maven
- **Features**: REST API, JWT Auth, JPA, Security, Swagger
